    • Method Detail

      • makeVolMap

        protected void makeVolMap()
                   throws DockerVolCreationException
        This map is a link between file paths inside the container (the containerized path) and paths outside the container (the decontainerized path). This program and all scripts are (presumably) running inside the docker container, and need to use the containerized path. The user, and thus the logs and the config file(s), are outside of the docker container, and need to use the decontainerized path. In this map is built using the Mounts map from docker. Each value in this map is the containerized path; which is the destination (or "target") in the docker mounts map. Each key in this map is a representation of the original host file path; however the form of this path varies on different host systems (mac vs windows) and different versions of docker. The representation of a unix-like path is exactly the format that is produce by unix commands such as pwd. The path begins with "/" and uses "/" separators. The representation of windows file paths varies between docker versions. The representation in this map is:
        /
        Throws:
        DockerVolCreationException

      • formatHostPath

        protected String formatHostPath(String path)
        Given a path as it appears in the Docker inspect Mount host info, convert the path to a form suitable for the map as a key.
        Parameters:
        path - A path taken from the host part of a Mount entry in the docker info.
        Returns:

      • formatInnerPath

        protected String formatInnerPath(String path)
        Given a path as it appears in the target portion of a Mount entry, convert the path to a form suitable for the map a value.
        Parameters:
        path - A path taken from the target/destination part of a Mount entry in the docker info.
        Returns:

      • formatConfigPath

        protected String formatConfigPath(String path)
        Give a path as it appears in the config file, convert it to a form suitable for matching to map keys.
        Parameters:
        path - A path taken from the config file. Relative paths should already be converted to absolute paths.
        Returns:

      • getMap

        public TreeMap<String,String> getMap()
        Description copied from interface: DockerMountMapper
        The map at represents the connection of inner path to outer path. Value is the inner path, the path form that can be used inside the docker container. Key is the outer path, the path form that represents the path on the host machine.
        Specified by:
        getMap in interface DockerMountMapper
        Specified by:
        getMap in interface PathMapper
        Returns:
